_documentation.description: This file manages all robot data for the website. The active robot is featured prominently on the homepage.

fields.id: Unique identifier for the robot (used in URLs and code)
fields.name: Display name for the robot
fields.description: Brief description of the robot (1-2 sentences)
fields.image: Path to robot photo (16:9 aspect ratio recommended, min 800px wide)
fields.model3d: Path to 3D model file (.glb or .gltf format) - leave empty if none

adding_3d_models.format: Use GLB or GLTF format (GLB preferred for single-file convenience)
adding_3d_models.size: Keep models under 10MB for fast loading
adding_3d_models.optimization: Use Blender or gltf.report to optimize before adding

tips: Only ONE robot should have status 'active' at a time
The active robot is featured in the 3D viewer on the homepage
Robot images should show the robot clearly against a neutral background
3D models should be properly scaled - 1 unit = 1 inch recommended
Add new robots at the TOP of the array to show newest first
